knockbackDist_DirectHit.Wiki: Amount of knockback applied if target is hit hit without blocking

knockbackDist_Guard.Wiki: Amount of knockback applied if target is hit while blocking

knockbackDist_JustGuard.Wiki: Amount of knockback applied if target is hit while deflecting

spEffectId0.Wiki: Applies speffect when the attack connects

spEffectId1.Wiki: Applies speffect when the attack connects

spEffectId2.Wiki: Applies speffect when the attack connects

spEffectId3.Wiki: Applies speffect when the attack connects

spEffectId4.Wiki: Applies speffect when the attack connects

atkPhysCorrection.Wiki: Multiplies physical damage based on the weapons base damage

atkMagCorrection.Wiki: Multiplies magic damage based on the weapons base damage

atkFireCorrection.Wiki: Multiplies fire damage based on the weapons base damage

atkThunCorrection.Wiki: Multiplies lightning damage based on the weapons base damage

atkStamCorrection.Wiki: Multiplies posture damage based on the weapons base damage

atkSuperArmorCorrection.Wiki: Multiplies super armor damage based on the weapons base damage

hit0_Priority.Wiki: If there are multiple hit capsules, the one with the higher priority will connect

hit1_Priority.Wiki: If there are multiple hit capsules, the one with the higher priority will connect

hit2_Priority.Wiki: If there are multiple hit capsules, the one with the higher priority will connect

hit3_Priority.Wiki: If there are multiple hit capsules, the one with the higher priority will connect

dmgLevel.Wiki: Damage Level (stun type) applied by the attack

guardCutCancelRate.Wiki: The amount that will go through a guard no matter what. Only works when the player doesn't have Kuro's Charm

atkType.Wiki: Determines the SFX and SE used when attacking

isDisableNoDamage.Wiki: Attack will connect even during Invincibility frames

friendlyTarget.Wiki: Will this hitbox hit your allies?

atkDarkCorrection.Wiki: Multiplies dark damage based on the weapons base damage

deflectedAction.Wiki: Animation that will play when this attack is blocked

justDeflectedAction.Wiki: Animation that will play when this attack is deflected

statusAilmentAtkPowerCorrectRate.Wiki: Alters the amount of status build-up dealt by a percent

directAtkStamDamage.Wiki: Posture damage multiplier for direct hits

repelLostStamDamage.Wiki: Posture damage multiplier for blocked hits

directAtkStamDamage_Attacker.Wiki: Posture damage dealt to the attacker when this attack hits directly

repelVictoryStamDamage_Attacker.Wiki: Posture damage dealt to the attacker when this attack is blocked

repelLostStamDamage_Attacker.Wiki: Posture damage dealt to the attacker when this attack is deflected

staminaDamageAttackHitParry.Wiki: Flat posture damage dealt to attacker if this attack is countered with Mikiri Counter

counterSpEffectCondition.Wiki: Will activate the counterSpEffectConditon on speffects, which triggers speffects on the attacker

statusAilmentAtkPowerCorrectRate_byPoint.Wiki: Alter the amount of status build-up dealt by a flat amount

disableGuard_vsGuardAttribute0.Wiki: Attack cannot be blocked with Kusabimaru

disableJustGuard_vsGuardAttribute0.Wiki: Attack cannot be deflected with Kusabimaru

disableGuard_vsGuardAttribute1.Wiki: Attack cannot be blocked with Umbrella

disableJustGuard_vsGuardAttribute1.Wiki: Attack cannot be deflected with Umbrella
